span.style: font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;

p.span: The Oran R-III School District is located in Scott County in Southeast Missouri, approximately 140 miles due south of St. Louis, in a small town called Oran. It is a small district with 354 students enrolled in grades K-12. Teachers strive each day to help "Eagles Learn to Fly."

div.h3: Oran Students Demonstrating their Oran Eagle Pride
